answers.answer: Hi,You would need to maintain strict control of blood sugar levels in view of the other disease processes as an uncontrolled blood sugar level will increase the chances of infection and and other complications including neuropathy and nephropathy (kidney involvement).Bone metastasis would need palliative support for the pain which is sometimes debilitating.Hepatitis C virus would further mean that the immune system is compromised; also the chances of the breast cancer spreading to the liver is a possibilty as bone metastasis has already occurred.A regular monitoring of the liver function tests is essential.You have not mentioned your age and the medication that you are currently taking.About the diet and nutritional needs - it would be best to eat a balanced diet - with lots of water and fresh fruits and vegetables. Avoid alcohol and smoking. Avoid processed foods.Take vitamin and mineral supplements especially calcium and vitamin B complex in consultation with your doctor.You could also ask your doctor to refer you to a nutritionist who could draw a daily diet plan for you.Do let us know about your progress.Hope this helps.Good luck.
